name: Ritual (itch) (Dead Unicorn)
description:
Ritual is short horror game about summoning a demon. You awake to find yourself in a snow covered forest with no memory of who you are. But one thing is certain, you must summon a demon. Cut down trees and build fires to stay warm. Search the wilderness for offerings and clues to complete your ritual. Good luck...

  • TAB - Inventory
  • WASD - Move
  • ENTER - Accept
  • ESCAPE - Pause
  • E - Interact
  • L - Build Fire (Req. Materials)
  • K - Axe

If you enjoyed the game, feel free to follow me on social media and play some more of my games!
